sect2.title: Uninstalling & Unlinking
sect2.para: To unlink and uninstall dpp, run brewunlinklibdpp brewuninstalllibdpp

simplesect.para: As a precaution, double check inside /opt/homebrew/lib and /opt/homebrew/include to make sure that libdpp does not exist. If it does, remove files/folders relating to libdpp. If there are files left here and you don't remove them, you may see issues arise with different versions of D++. Sometimes, it may still act like some version of D++ exists, if it does that then please restart your system!
